tbl_conf.ddl:
CREATE TABLE tbl_conf (
  key TEXT
  , value TEXT
  , constraint tbl_conf_PKC primary key (key)
)

tbl_conf_alert_icon_group.ddl:
CREATE TABLE tbl_conf_alert_icon_group( 
  group_id INTEGER not null primary key AUTOINCREMENT
  , disp_data_seq INTEGER not null
  , light_alert_icon_id INTEGER not null
  , dark_alert_icon_id INTEGER not null
  , view_kind_select INTEGER not null
)

tbl_conf_board.ddl: CREATE TABLE tbl_conf_board ( board_id INTEGER not null primary key AUTOINCREMENT , sub_screen INTEGER not null , monitor_flg INTEGER default 1 not null , title TEXT , message TEXT)

tbl_conf_channel.ddl:
CREATE TABLE tbl_conf_channel (
  number INTEGER not null
  , ch_name TEXT
  , ph_id TEXT
  , ch_unit TEXT
  , data_type INTEGER
  , data_id TEXT
  , coefficient1 REAL
  , coefficient0 REAL
  , is_min_max INTEGER
  , data_min REAL
  , data_max REAL
  , range_threshold REAL
  , eq_no INTEGER
  , eq_ch_no INTEGER
  , latest_type integer after ch_unit, ch_order integer, constraint tbl_conf_channel_PKC primary key (ph_id)
)

tbl_conf_disp_background.ddl:
CREATE TABLE tbl_conf_disp_background( 
  screen INTEGER not null
  , sub_screen INTEGER not null
  , title TEXT
  , image TEXT
  , constraint tbl_conf_disp_background_PKC primary key (screen, sub_screen)
)

)

)

  , color TEXT
  , sort_order INTEGER
)

  , alpha REAL
  , font_color TEXT

  , font_size INTEGER
)

)

)

)

not (cast(coalesce(ch0000,0) as int) or cast(coalesce(ch0048,0) as int))
(not((cast(coalesce(ch0000,0) as int)) and (cast(coalesce(ch0048,0) as int)))) and(cast(coalesce(ch0000,0) as int) or cast(coalesce(ch0048,0) as int))

 schedule_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT

 schedule_id INTEGER not null
 , from_date TEXT not null
 , threshold INTEGER not null
 , constraint tbl_sc_schedule_thresholds_PKC primary key (schedule_id,from_date)

(
	[datetime] text NOT NULL,
	[ctlval] integer DEFAULT 100,
	PRIMARY KEY ([datetime])
)

(

	[us_gettime] text,
	PRIMARY KEY ([rec_no])
)

tbl_result_pcs.ddl:

	[result_seq_no] integer,

	[system_no] integer,
	[unit_no] integer,
	[type] integer,
	[ctlval] integer,

	[upload_flg] integer DEFAULT 1
)

)

(

	[ctlval] integer DEFAULT 100,
	PRIMARY KEY ([datetime])
)

index: CREATE INDEX idx_datetime_tbl_day on tbl_day(year, mon, day)
CREATE INDEX idx_datetime_tbl_month on tbl_month(year, mon)

tbl_day.ddl:
CREATE TABLE [tbl_day]
(
	[type] text NOT NULL,
	[datetime] numeric NOT NULL,
	[year] integer NOT NULL,
	[mon] integer NOT NULL,
	[day] integer NOT NULL,
	[accumulate] real NOT NULL,
	[data_count] integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ([type], [datetime])
)

tbl_month.ddl:
CREATE TABLE [tbl_month]
(
	[type] text NOT NULL,
	[datetime] numeric NOT NULL,
	[year] integer NOT NULL,
	[mon] integer NOT NULL,
	[accumulate] real NOT NULL,
	[data_count] integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ([type], [datetime])
)

tbl_total_accumulate.ddl:
CREATE TABLE `tbl_total_accumulate` (
	`type`	TEXT NOT NULL,
	`datetime`	NUMERIC NOT NULL,
	`accumulate`	REAL NOT NULL,
	`data_count`	INTEGER NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`type`)
)
